S.FORM: Yemen hya' ga cyux maki' tay 15 00 N, 48 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 527,968 sq km (maki' tay 50ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 527,968 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 27,392,779. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga44.50 , lhlahuy hya' ga 1 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 54.50 . kinmhgan(Koka) qani ga,'buyan nya squ kska na hezyal qu cinbwanan. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Sanaa. Kay ru gaga qnxan qqnxan pinbaqan snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 22 na tay ymagal byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi, aring ryax 27 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
